pages.text: <li>consumes <l>(misc/crafting_material#labware)Labware</l> (top right slot)<li>the <l>(misc/crafting_material#gene_template)template</l> will not be consumed (top left slot)<li>will place all traits that are present in the template at once<li>creatures from artificial sources (a.k.a. ignoble stock) have a chance of not surviving the imprinting process
Can be used to imprint genetic traits.
